Introduction

11Degrees is a South Korean co-ed rock band consisting of members Kim Kangsan, Lee Yunwoo, Heo Jiye and Hong Jungi currently under FKMP as an independent artist. They debuted on December 7th, 2018 under OKCompany with their first single "The Last Moment". They left OKCompany in the same year and has been inependent since then and joining FKMP in 2022.
